extends GnwGuiWindow

public static void parse(java.lang.String[] args)

loadInitialNetworks

public void loadInitialNetworks()
Load initial networks from the content of GnwGuiSettings.initialNetworksToLoad_. These networks (structures and dynamical models) will be loaded at the end of the initialization of the program.
